mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM route WHERE id = #{id} AND status != 'DELETE'

SELECT id , name , distance , grade , departure_terminal_id , arrive_terminal_id , departure_time , arrive_time , created_at , updated_at , status FROM route WHERE name Like '%${name}%' AND status != 'DELETE'

SELECT id , name , distance , grade , departure_terminal_id , arrive_terminal_id , departure_time , arrive_time , created_at , updated_at , status FROM route WHERE departure_terminal_id = #{departureTerminalId} AND arrive_terminal_id = #{arriveTerminalId} AND grade = #{grade} AND departure_time = #{departureTime} AND status != 'DELETE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO route (name, distance, seat_residual, grade, departure_terminal_id, arrive_terminal_id, departure_time, arrive_time, created_at, updated_at, status) values (#{name}, #{distance}, #{seatResidual}, #{grade}, #{departureTerminalId}, #{arriveTerminalId}, #{departureTime}, #{arriveTime}, NOW(), NOW(), #{status});
mapper.update: UPDATE route SET status = 'DELETE' WHERE id = #{id} AND status != 'DELETE'
